mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: Francis H. Pierpont Civil War Telegrams
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Ackley, George K. to Lightburn, Joseph
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Ackley, George K.
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Col Lightburn Care Gov Peirpont [Francis H. Pierpont] Wheeling Dec 5 1861. By Telegraph from Point Pleasant 4 1861. See Dr Wirtz medical Director and get requisition for me instruments Geo K Ackley Surgeon 4th Va Regt 11Hm34 pd
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Ackley, George K.
Point Pleasant, (West) Virginia
Wheeling, (West) Virginia
Lightburn, Joseph
